00048 /*===========================================================================
00049  *      File :          l_histogram.c
00050  *      Description :   histogram manipulation functions
00051  *      Creation Date : June 1994
00052  *      Author :        Scott Mahlke
00053  *
00054  *==========================================================================*/
00055 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00056 #include <config.h>
00057 #include <string.h>
00058 #include <library/l_histogram.h>
00059 #include <library/l_alloc_new.h>
00060 #include <library/i_error.h>
00061 
00062 
00063 L_Alloc_Pool *L_histogram_pool = NULL;
00064 
00065 L_Histogram *
00066 L_create_histogram (char *name, int init_size)
00067 {
00068   int size = 0, temp;
00069   L_Histogram *hist;
00070 
00071   if (L_histogram_pool == NULL)
00072     L_histogram_pool =
00073       L_create_alloc_pool ("L_Histogram", sizeof (L_Histogram), 8);
00074   hist = (L_Histogram *) L_alloc (L_histogram_pool);
00075   hist->name = strdup (name);
00076 
00077   if (init_size <= L_DEFAULT_HISTOGRAM_SIZE)
00078     {
00079       size = L_DEFAULT_HISTOGRAM_SIZE;
00080     }
00081   else if (init_size > L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE)
00082     {
00083       I_punt ("L_create_histogram: init_size %d too big", init_size);
00084     }
00085   else
00086     {
00087       /* pick multiple of default size >= init_size */
00088       temp = L_DEFAULT_HISTOGRAM_SIZE;
00089       while (temp < init_size)
00090         {
00091           temp *= 2;
00092         }
00093       if (temp > L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE)
00094         I_punt ("L_create_histogram: init_size %d too big", init_size);
00095       size = temp;
00096     }
00097 
00098   hist->data = (double *) calloc (size, sizeof (double));
00099   hist->size = size;
00100   hist->over_max_data = 0.0;
00101 
00102   return (hist);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void
00106 L_delete_histogram (L_Histogram * hist)
00107 {
00108   if (hist->name)
00109     {
00110       free (hist->name);
00111       hist->name = NULL;
00112     }
00113   if (hist->data)
00114     {
00115       free (hist->data);
00116       hist->data = NULL;
00117     }
00118 
00119   L_free (L_histogram_pool, hist);
00120 }
00121 
00122 /*
00123  *      Entry is the number for which u want to update, so there must
00124  *      be space in data array to access data[entry]
00125  */
00126 void
00127 L_realloc_histogram_data (L_Histogram * hist, int entry)
00128 {
00129   int i, temp, target_size, alloc_size;
00130   double *temp_data;
00131 
00132   if (entry >= L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE)
00133     I_punt ("L_realloc_histogram_data: entry %d is too large", entry);
00134 
00135   /* to access location entry, must have array of size atleast entry+1 */
00136   target_size = entry + 1;
00137 
00138   temp = hist->size;
00139   while (temp < target_size)
00140     {
00141       temp *= 2;
00142     }
00143   if (temp > L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE)
00144     I_punt ("L_realloc_histogram_data: entry %d is too large", entry);
00145   alloc_size = temp;
00146 
00147   temp_data = (double *) calloc (alloc_size, sizeof (double));
00148 
00149   /* copy over old values into new array */
00150   for (i = 0; i < hist->size; i++)
00151     {
00152       temp_data[i] = hist->data[i];
00153     }
00154 
00155   /* free old data array */
00156   free (hist->data);
00157 
00158   /* update hist structure */
00159   hist->data = temp_data;
00160   hist->size = alloc_size;
00161 }
00162 
00163 void
00164 L_update_histogram (L_Histogram * hist, int entry, double val)
00165 {
00166   if (hist == NULL)
00167     I_punt ("L_update_histogram: histogram is NULL");
00168   if (entry < 0)
00169     I_punt ("L_update_histogram: cannot specify negative entry");
00170 
00171   /* check if need to realloc */
00172   if ((hist->size <= entry) && (entry < L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE))
00173     {
00174       L_realloc_histogram_data (hist, entry);
00175     }
00176 
00177   /* update it by val */
00178   if (entry >= L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE)
00179     hist->over_max_data += val;
00180   else
00181     hist->data[entry] += val;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void
00185 L_clear_histogram (L_Histogram * hist)
00186 {
00187   int i, size;
00188 
00189   if (hist == NULL)
00190     I_punt ("L_clear_histogram: hist is NULL");
00191 
00192   size = hist->size;
00193   for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
00194     {
00195       hist->data[i] = 0.0;
00196     }
00197   hist->over_max_data = 0.0;
00198 }
00199 
00200 void
00201 L_scale_histogram_entries (L_Histogram * hist, double scale)
00202 {
00203   int i, size;
00204 
00205   if (hist == NULL)
00206     I_punt ("L_scale_histogram_entries: hist is NULL");
00207 
00208   size = hist->size;
00209   for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
00210     {
00211       hist->data[i] *= scale;
00212     }
00213   hist->over_max_data *= scale;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void
00217 L_copy_histogram (L_Histogram * dest, L_Histogram * src)
00218 {
00219   int i, size;
00220 
00221   if ((dest == NULL) || (src == NULL))
00222     I_punt ("L_copy_histogram: dest or src is NULL");
00223 
00224   size = src->size;
00225   if (size > dest->size)
00226     L_realloc_histogram_data (dest, size);
00227 
00228   for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
00229     {
00230       dest->data[i] = src->data[i];
00231     }
00232 
00233   dest->over_max_data = src->over_max_data;
00234 }
00235 
00236 void
00237 L_add_histograms (L_Histogram * dest, L_Histogram * src1, L_Histogram * src2)
00238 {
00239   int i, size;
00240   double src1_data, src2_data;
00241 
00242   if ((dest == NULL) || (src1 == NULL) || (src2 == NULL))
00243     I_punt ("L_add_histograms: dest or src1 are NULL");
00244 
00245   /* set size of dest to max of src1 and src2 */
00246   if (src1->size > src2->size)
00247     size = src1->size;
00248   else
00249     size = src2->size;
00250   if (size > dest->size)
00251     L_realloc_histogram_data (dest, size - 1);
00252 
00253   /* add up the elements from each histogram */
00254   for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
00255     {
00256 
00257       if (i < src1->size)
00258         src1_data = src1->data[i];
00259       else
00260         src1_data = 0.0;
00261 
00262       if (i < src2->size)
00263         src2_data = src2->data[i];
00264       else
00265         src2_data = 0.0;
00266 
00267       dest->data[i] = src1_data + src2_data;
00268     }
00269 
00270   dest->over_max_data = src1->over_max_data + src2->over_max_data;
00271 }
00272 
00273 /*=========================================================================*/
00274 /*
00275  *      Functions for printing histograms

00278 
00279 /*
00280  *      Mode = L_PRINT_ALL_ENTRIES
00281  *      Print out every histogram entry
00282  */
00283 static void
00284 L_print_histogram_all_entries (FILE * F, L_Histogram * hist)
00285 {
00286   int i, marker, last;
00287   double ratio, sum;
00288 
00289   fprintf (F, "    Histogram of %s\n", hist->name);
00290 
00291   /* find number of largest entry with nonzero value in it */
00292   marker = -1;
00293   for (i = hist->size - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00294     {
00295       if (hist->data[i] != 0)
00296         {
00297           marker = i;
00298           break;
00299         }
00300     }
00301 
00302   if (marker != -1)
00303     {
00304       marker += 1;
00305       sum = 0.0;
00306       for (i = 0; i < marker; i++)
00307         {
00308           sum += ((double) ((int) hist->data[i]));
00309         }
00310       sum += ((double) ((int) hist->over_max_data));
00311 
00312       /* header info */
00313       fprintf (F, "    %d entries\n", marker);
00314 
00315       last = 0;
00316       for (i = 0; i < marker; i++)
00317         {
00318           ratio = ((double) ((int) hist->data[i])) / sum;
00319           fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00320                    last, i, (int) hist->data[i], ratio);
00321           last = i + 1;
00322         }
00323 
00324       /* print out over_max_data entries */
00325       if (hist->over_max_data > 0.0)
00326         {
00327           ratio = ((double) ((int) hist->over_max_data)) / sum;
00328           fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00329                    last, -1, (int) hist->over_max_data, ratio);
00330         }
00331     }
00332   else
00333     {
00334       fprintf (F, "    0 entries\n");
00335     }
00336 }
00337 
00338 /*
00339  *      Mode = L_PRINT_GROUPED_VALUES
00340  *      Print histogram according to the following ranges
00341  */
00342 #define NUM_HIST_PRINT  10
00343 static int hist_print[NUM_HIST_PRINT] = {
00344   0,
00345   1,
00346   2,
00347   4,
00348   8,
00349   16,
00350   32,
00351   64,
00352   128,
00353   256
00354 };
00355 
00356 static void
00357 L_print_histogram_grouped_values (FILE * F, L_Histogram * hist)
00358 {
00359   int i, marker, last, print_index;
00360   double ratio, sum, cur, rest;
00361 
00362   fprintf (F, "    Histogram of %s\n", hist->name);
00363 
00364   /* find number of largest entry with nonzero value in it */
00365   marker = -1;
00366   for (i = hist->size - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00367     {
00368       if (hist->data[i] != 0)
00369         {
00370           marker = i;
00371           break;
00372         }
00373     }
00374 
00375   if (marker != -1)
00376     {
00377       marker++;
00378       sum = 0;
00379       for (i = 0; i < marker; i++)
00380         {
00381           sum += (double) ((int) hist->data[i]);
00382         }
00383       sum += ((double) ((int) hist->over_max_data));
00384 
00385       /* header info */
00386       fprintf (F, "    %d entries\n", (NUM_HIST_PRINT + 1));
00387 
00388       cur = 0.0;
00389       last = 0;
00390       print_index = 0;
00391       for (i = 0; i <= hist_print[NUM_HIST_PRINT - 1]; i++)
00392         {
00393           if (hist_print[print_index] == i)
00394             {
00395               cur += hist->data[i];
00396               ratio = ((double) ((int) cur)) / sum;
00397               fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00398                        last, i, (int) cur, ratio);
00399               cur = 0.0;
00400               last = i + 1;
00401               print_index++;
00402             }
00403           else
00404             {
00405               cur += hist->data[i];
00406             }
00407         }
00408 
00409       rest = 0.0;
00410       for (i = (hist_print[NUM_HIST_PRINT - 1] + 1); i < marker; i++)
00411         {
00412           rest += hist->data[i];
00413         }
00414       rest += hist->over_max_data;
00415       ratio = ((double) ((int) rest)) / sum;
00416       fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00417                last, -1, (int) rest, ratio);
00418     }
00419   else
00420     {
00421       fprintf (F, "    0 entries\n");
00422     }
00423 }
00424 
00425 /*
00426  *      Mode = L_PRINT_GROUPED_PERCENTAGES
00427  */
00428 static void
00429 L_print_histogram_grouped_percentages (FILE * F, L_Histogram * hist)
00430 {
00431   int i, marker, last;
00432   double ratio, sum, cur;
00433 
00434   fprintf (F, "    Histogram of %s\n", hist->name);
00435 
00436   /* find number of largest entry with nonzero value in it */
00437   marker = -1;
00438   for (i = hist->size - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00439     {
00440       if (hist->data[i] != 0)
00441         {
00442           marker = i;
00443           break;
00444         }
00445     }
00446 
00447   if (marker > 100)
00448     I_punt ("L_print_histogram_grouped_percentages: illegal histogram size");
00449 
00450   if (marker != -1)
00451     {
00452       marker = 101;
00453       sum = 0;
00454       for (i = 0; i < marker; i++)
00455         {
00456           sum += (double) ((int) hist->data[i]);
00457         }
00458 
00459       /* header info */
00460       fprintf (F, "    11 entries\n");
00461 
00462       /* 0th entry handled separately */
00463       ratio = ((double) ((int) hist->data[0])) / sum;
00464       fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00465                0, 0, (int) hist->data[0], ratio);
00466 
00467       cur = 0.0;
00468       last = 1;
00469       for (i = 1; i < marker; i++)
00470         {
00471           if ((i % 10) == 0)
00472             {
00473               cur += hist->data[i];
00474               ratio = ((double) ((int) cur)) / sum;
00475               fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00476                        last, i, (int) cur, ratio);
00477               cur = 0.0;
00478               last = i + 1;
00479             }
00480           else
00481             {
00482               cur += hist->data[i];
00483             }
00484         }
00485     }
00486   else
00487     {
00488       fprintf (F, "    0 entries\n");
00489     }
00490 }
00491 
00492 
00493 /*
00494  *      Mode = L_PRINT_INDIVIDUAL_PERCENTAGES
00495  *      Have to pass in sum, since we are not summing up entries for
00496  *      computing a ratio.
00497  */
00498 static void
00499 L_print_histogram_individual_percentages (FILE * F, L_Histogram * hist,
00500                                           double sum)
00501 {
00502   int i, marker, last;
00503   double ratio;
00504 
00505   fprintf (F, "    Histogram of %s\n", hist->name);
00506 
00507   /* find number of largest entry with nonzero value in it */
00508   marker = -1;
00509   for (i = hist->size - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00510     {
00511       if (hist->data[i] != 0)
00512         {
00513           marker = i;
00514           break;
00515         }
00516     }
00517 
00518   if (marker > 100)
00519     I_punt
00520       ("L_print_histogram_individual_percentages: illegal histogram size");
00521 
00522   if (marker != -1)
00523     {
00524       marker = 101;
00525 
00526       /* header info */
00527       fprintf (F, "    11 entries\n");
00528 
00529       /* 0th entry handled separately */
00530       ratio = ((double) ((int) hist->data[0])) / sum;
00531       fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00532                0, 0, (int) hist->data[0], ratio);
00533 
00534       last = 1;
00535       for (i = 1; i < marker; i++)
00536         {
00537           if ((i % 10) == 0)
00538             {
00539               ratio = ((double) ((int) hist->data[i])) / sum;
00540               fprintf (F, "        %5d %5d   %11d              %1.4f\n",
00541                        last, i, (int) hist->data[i], ratio);
00542               last = i + 1;
00543             }
00544           /* else do nothing */
00545         }
00546     }
00547   else
00548     {
00549       fprintf (F, "    0 entries\n");
00550     }
00551 }
00552 
00553 static void
00554 L_print_histogram_average_value (FILE * F, L_Histogram * hist)
00555 {
00556   int i, marker;
00557   double tot, sum, ratio;
00558 
00559   /* find number of largest entry with nonzero value in it */
00560   marker = -1;
00561   for (i = hist->size - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00562     {
00563       if (hist->data[i] != 0)
00564         {
00565           marker = i;
00566           break;
00567         }
00568     }
00569 
00570   fprintf (F, "    Histogram of %s \n", hist->name);
00571   if (marker != -1)
00572     {
00573       marker += 1;
00574       sum = 0.0;
00575       for (i = 0; i < marker; i++)
00576         {
00577           sum += hist->data[i];
00578         }
00579       sum += hist->over_max_data;
00580 
00581       tot = 0.0;
00582       for (i = 0; i < marker; i++)
00583         {
00584           tot = tot + (double) (hist->data[i] * i);
00585         }
00586       tot = tot + (hist->over_max_data * L_MAX_HISTOGRAM_SIZE);
00587       ratio = tot / sum;
00588 
00589       fprintf (F, "    Average_value %f\n", ratio);
00590     }
00591 
00592   else
00593     {
00594       fprintf (F, "    Average_value 0.00\n");
00595     }
00596 
00597 
00598 
00599 }
00600 
00601 /*
00602  *      Main print routine
00603  */
00604 void
00605 L_print_histogram (FILE * F, L_Histogram * hist, int mode, double sum)
00606 {
00607   if (F == NULL)
00608     I_punt ("L_print_histogram: F is NULL");
00609   if (hist == NULL)
00610     I_punt ("L_print_histogram: hist is NULL");
00611 
00612   switch (mode)
00613     {
00614     case L_PRINT_ALL_ENTRIES:
00615       L_print_histogram_all_entries (F, hist);
00616       break;
00617     case L_PRINT_GROUPED_VALUES:
00618       L_print_histogram_grouped_values (F, hist);
00619       break;
00620     case L_PRINT_GROUPED_PERCENTAGES:
00621       L_print_histogram_grouped_percentages (F, hist);
00622       break;
00623     case L_PRINT_INDIVIDUAL_PERCENTAGES:
00624       L_print_histogram_individual_percentages (F, hist, sum);
00625       break;
00626     case L_PRINT_AVERAGE_VALUE:
00627       L_print_histogram_average_value (F, hist);
00628       break;
00629     default:
00630       I_punt ("L_print_histogram: illegal mode, %d", mode);
00631     }
00632 }
